docs.title: Alwiest Page
docs.text:
Привет, мир! Это главная страница Alwiest.

For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: 👋 About Me
docs.text: I’m Alwiest — a student, builder, and quiet observer of systems. Currently shaping ideas in code, design, and the space between them.

docs.title: 🧠 What I Care About
docs.text:
• Simplicity over complexity
  • Clarity over cleverness
  • Depth over trends
  • Intentional work over busywork

I write code that lasts, interfaces that respect attention, and thoughts that challenge comfort.

docs.title: 💻 Currently
docs.text:
• Building personal tools with Python, HTML/CSS, and plain logic
  • Exploring the philosophy of technology and digital minimalism
  • Writing notes that may one day become something more
  • Learning to balance ambition with peace

docs.title: 🌐 Elsewhere
docs.text:
You can find traces of my work here: 📧 Alwiest@example.com 🐙 github.com/Alwiest

(I don’t do social media. My code is my voice.)

“Make it simple. Make it honest. Make it yours.” — Alwiest
